about.title: Five IT students
about.description1: Hello everyone! We are a group of five students from ITET Rapisardi - Da Vinci who are about to enter our senior year of high school. And what better way to end our schooling than to do an amazing project together?
about.description2: Our innovative idea concerns the 'puppet' in the game of hangman. We introduced an interesting variation: instead of falling, the 'puppet' is already there, but every time you make a mistake, a piece of it is removed! This makes the game even more engaging and fun.
about.description3: In addition, we have included a touch display in our project. The display is mainly used for menu management, allowing intuitive and easy-to-use interaction. As for the input of letters, we have a dedicated keyboard that makes the input of choices quick and easy.

gameDescription.title: Game Description
gameDescription.description1: The remodernized HangMan game is an innovative reinterpretation of the classic HangMan game. In this version, pieces fall progressively throughout the game instead of appearing after each mistake is made, providing a unique and engaging visual element. The game features various components that contribute to an interactive experience. It is equipped with a microcontroller that manages and controls the game functions. In addition, there is a touch display that allows users to interact intuitively with the game. The game keyboard was specially created by us and offers a unique and engaging way to enter letters and guess words. The body of the game was made with the use of electromagnets, which contribute to the visual effect of falling during the game, creating a dynamic and engaging atmosphere.
gameDescription.description2: In addition, the game offers the ability to adjust the difficulty to suit the player's preferences. You can select from several difficulty options to customize the game experience. All words used in the game are stored in an online database, which offers a wide range of words in different categories. This provides a variety of challenges for players and allows them to explore a wide selection of words. In addition, a mode is available that allows players to guess the entire word by entering it directly, rather than attempting it letter by letter. This option offers a quick alternative for those who already have a conclusion in mind or wish to test their ability to find the correct word.
gameDescription.description3: Finally, the base of the game has been 3D printed by us, allowing for complete customization of the shape and design to perfectly fit the remodeled HangMan game.
